trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The plasmoid can squeeze through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide, provided it is wearing and carrying nothing. It has advantage on ability checks it makes to initiate or escape a grapple.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The plasmoid can hold its breath for 1 hour.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The plasmoid makes three Pseudopod attacks.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit (with advantage if the plasmoid has one or more allies within 10 feet of itself), reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: The plasmoid halves the damage that it takes from an attack that hits it. The plasmoid must be able to see the attacker.
